problem_text_cn: 如图,为了测量校园水平地面上一棵树的高度,数学兴趣小组做了如下的探索:把一面很小的镜子水平放置在离树底(B)7.8米的点E处,然后观察者沿着直线BE后退到点D,这时恰好在镜子里看到树梢顶点A,再用皮尺量得DE=3.2米,观察者目高CD=1.6米,则树(AB)的高度约为()米．
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in order to measure the height of a tree on the horizontal ground of the campus, the mathematics interest group did the following exploration: put a small mirror horizontally at point E away from the bottom of the tree (B)N_0, and then the observer follows along The straight line BE retreats to the point D. At this time, the treetop vertex A is seen in the mirror, and then measured with a tape measure DE = N_1, the observer's eye height CD = N_2, then the height of the tree (AB) is approximately ().
raw_comment: 本题考查了相似三角形的应用:利用视点和盲区的知识构建相似三角形,用相似三角形对应边的比相等的性质求物体的高度．
